statements: SELECT * FROM stem_cell_research_data;
SELECT research_id, stem_cell_type FROM stem_cell_research_data ORDER BY research_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_research_data WHERE stem_cell_type = 'Embryonic';
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_research_data ORDER BY effectiveness_score ASC;
SELECT MAX(effectiveness_score) AS max_score FROM stem_cell_research_data;
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_research_data WHERE research_id = 3;
SELECT stem_cell_type, effectiveness_score FROM stem_cell_research_data WHERE effectiveness_score > 4.5 ORDER BY stem_cell_type DESC;
SELECT research_id, stem_cell_type FROM stem_cell_research_data WHERE stem_cell_type LIKE 'Embryonic%' ORDER BY research_id ASC, effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT stem_cell_type, AVG(effectiveness_score) AS avg_score FROM stem_cell_research_data GROUP BY stem_cell_type HAVING AVG(effectiveness_score) > 3.0;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_research, MAX(effectiveness_score) AS max_score FROM stem_cell_research_data;
SELECT * FROM StemCellTypes;
SELECT cell_type, effectiveness FROM StemCellTypes WHERE effectiveness > 3.0;
SELECT * FROM ResearchData WHERE research_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT data_id, research_date, research_result FROM ResearchData ORDER BY research_date DESC;
SELECT cell_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM ResearchData JOIN StemCellTypes ON ResearchData.cell_type_id = StemCellTypes.id GROUP BY cell_type;
SELECT * FROM StemCellTypes;
SELECT cell_type, effectiveness FROM StemCellTypes WHERE effectiveness > 3.0;
SELECT * FROM ResearchData WHERE research_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT cell_type, research_result FROM StemCellTypes JOIN ResearchData ON StemCellTypes.id = ResearchData.cell_type_id;
SELECT research_date, cell_type, research_result FROM ResearchData JOIN StemCellTypes ON ResearchData.cell_type_id = StemCellTypes.id WHERE research_result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_types;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM research_data WHERE published_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT research_results.id, researcher_name, cell_type, effectiveness_score FROM research_results JOIN research_data ON research_results.research_id = research_data.id JOIN stem_cell_types ON research_results.cell_type_id = stem_cell_types.id;
SELECT cell_type, AVG(effectiveness) AS average_effectiveness FROM stem_cell_types GROUP BY cell_type;

SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(research_results.id) AS research_count FROM research_data JOIN research_results ON research_data.id = research_results.research_id GROUP BY researcher_name ORDER BY research_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_types;
SELECT cell_type, effectiveness FROM stem_cell_types WHERE effectiveness > 0.5;
SELECT r.researcher_name, r.research_topic, s.cell_type, s.effectiveness_score FROM research_data r JOIN research_results rr ON r.id = rr.research_id JOIN stem_cell_types s ON rr.cell_type_id = s.id;

SELECT r.researcher_name, r.published_date, s.cell_type, s.effectiveness_score FROM research_data r JOIN research_results rr ON r.id = rr.research_id JOIN stem_cell_types s ON rr.cell_type_id = s.id WHERE rr.effectiveness_score > 0.7;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_research_results, AVG(rr.effectiveness_score) as avg_effectiveness_score FROM research_results rr JOIN stem_cell_types s ON rr.cell_type_id = s.id;
SELECT * FROM research_data;
SELECT research_id, stem_cell_type FROM research_data WHERE effectiveness_score > 80;
SELECT MAX(effectiveness_score) AS max_score FROM research_data;
SELECT result_id, result_description, result_date FROM research_results ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, area_of_expertise FROM researchers WHERE area_of_expertise = 'Regenerative Medicine';
SELECT * FROM research_data;
SELECT researcher_name, area_of_expertise FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT type_name, stem_cell_type FROM stem_cell_types JOIN research_data ON stem_cell_type = type_name;
SELECT researcher_name, result_description FROM researchers JOIN research_results ON researchers.researcher_id = research_results.researcher_id;
SELECT research_id, result_date FROM research_results ORDER BY result_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_types;
SELECT cell_type, id FROM stem_cell_types;
SELECT id, cell_type FROM stem_cell_types ORDER BY cell_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE name LIKE 'Dr%';
SELECT id, cell_type_id, effectiveness FROM research_results WHERE effectiveness > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, email FROM researchers WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT r.id, r.name, r.email, rt.tag FROM researchers r INNER JOIN research_tags rt ON r.id = rt.id;
SELECT rc.name AS center_name, rc.location, rr.researcher, rr.effectiveness FROM research_centers rc INNER JOIN research_results rr ON rc.id = rr.id WHERE rr.effectiveness > 75;
SELECT rt.tag, COUNT(*) AS total_researchers FROM research_tags rt INNER JOIN researchers r ON rt.id = r.id GROUP BY rt.tag ORDER BY total_researchers DESC;
